frontMatter.title: 记录一次authorized_keys被加锁引起的木马攻防战
frontMatter.summary: 发现一台服务器，ssh免密登陆不好使，用密码登陆后发现authorized_keys文件下有一条不知道的证书，估计是被黑了。删除证书时发现无法删除，提示 Operationnotpermitted

prev.title: 程序员技术资源分享群内容整理
prev.summary: @tualatrix 我用 Notion 整理了一下 @haoel 耗子叔社群的编程资源：https://t.co/G6X3fRy9vg ，展示效果不错。

next.title: XY problem
next.summary: The XY problem is a logical fallacy, a faulty mental model, and a communication problem encountered in help desk and similar situations in which the real issue, X, of the person asking for help is obscured, because instead of asking directly about issue X, they ask how to solve a secondary issue, Y, which they believe will allow them to resolve issue X.
